publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2583.1 Ms Sandra White: Drumchapel High School Pupils’ Act of Solidarity—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2583) in the name of Bill Butler, insert at end "and believes that the only way to avoid repeat treatment of this kind being visited on other asylum seekers is for immigration policy to be devolved to the Parliament." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S2M-2583.1 Ms Sandra White: Drumchapel High School Pupils’ Act of Solidarity—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2583) in the name of Bill Butler, insert at end "and believes that the only way to avoid repeat treatment of this kind being visited on other asylum seekers is for immigration policy to be devolved to the Parliament."
S2M-2583.1 Drumchapel High School Pupils’ Act of Solidarity (lodged on 17 March 2005) Mr Adam Ingram*, Michael Matheson*
S2M-2583.1 Drumchapel High School Pupils’ Act of Solidarity (lodged on 17 March 2005) Frances Curran*, Carolyn Leckie*
